data.title: Sao Tome and Principe Exchange Rate
data.meta_description: Updated charts and forecasts on Sao Tome and Principe Exchange Rate (LCU per USD, eop). Get access to accurate economic data and projections now.
data.text:
Consensus Forecasts and Projections for the next ten years

How should you choose a forecaster if some are too optimistic while others are too pessimistic? FocusEconomics collects Santomean exchange rate projections for the next ten years from a panel of 2 analysts at the leading national, regional and global forecast institutions. These projections are then validated by our in-house team of economists and data analysts and averaged to provide one Consensus Forecast you can rely on for each indicator. By averaging all forecasts, upside and downside forecasting errors tend to cancel each other out, leading to the most reliable exchange rate forecast available for Santomean exchange rate.

Download one of our sample reports to visualize what a Consensus Forecast is and see our Santomean exchange rate projections.

Want to get access to the full dataset of Santomean exchange rate forecasts? Send an email to info@focus-economics.com.
